2. turnoff
```
library(autotest)

f = function(x) {
  ifelse(x<5, x+1, x)
}

turnOffTraceback()
test_that('', {
  for (i in 1:5){
    registerPreMsg('In testing f(%d)', i)
    expect_equal(f(i), i + 1)
  }
})


test_that('', {
  expect_equal(f(1), 1 + 1)
  expect_equal(f(5), 5 + 1)
  expect_equal(f(6), 6 + 1)
})
```
